Class BTO

java.lang.Object
BTO.BTO
All Implemented Interfaces:
Search<Integer>
public class BTO extends Object implements Search<Integer>
Represents a Build-To-Order (BTO) housing project within the BTO system. Each BTO project contains information such as the project name, location, available room types (2-room and 3-room), application period, assigned manager, and a list of appointed officers. The project also supports access control, allowing only authorised managers and officers to perform updates. BTOs are used as the main entities that applicants can apply to for housing, and officers can apply to manage. Each project is assigned a unique auto-incremented ID.
Author:
Kah Teck, Keanan, Javier, Junnoske, Kevin

    • BTO

      public BTO(String name, String neighbourhood, int num2Rooms, int num3Rooms, Date applicationStart, Date applicationEnd, Manager manager, int maxOfficer, boolean visible)
      Constructs a new BTO (Build-To-Order) project with specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the BTO project
      neighbourhood - the neighbourhood where the project is located
      num2Rooms - number of 2-room units available
      num3Rooms - number of 3-room units available
      applicationStart - the start date of the application period
      applicationEnd - the end date of the application period
      manager - the manager responsible for the project
      maxOfficer - the maximum number of officers allowed
      visible - whether the project is currently visible to users
